data.name: The Golden rule,  solve for odic values
data.description: Comrade, Welcome.... You looked taller in the picture.... anyways... Today we will be solving a problem I have not quite been able to wrap my head around. If you inspect the terminal here you will see the machine is intaking 4 variables. c, s , g , p These variables correspond to incoming shipment containers and we need to calculate our companies super specific metric know as the odic value to each shipment. Each incoming shipment container will have 1 <= n <= 99 units of each. Those variables are then put through a calculation and an final output number (odic value) is returned. Your job is to find out the process behind the calculation so we can accurately measure each incoming shipment and assertain the odic value. Be sure to take into accout all elements of the problem. All number values in the calculation should be rounded down to the nearest whole number. Example : 107.868 => 107 Good luck comrade.
